item.title: Abrahamic History, Lengend and Mythology
item.description: There is set of religions that come from Abrahim. I was trying to understand how they all are related. There are three abrahamic religions Judaism Christanity Islam Q: Who is Abrahim(Ibrahim in quran) ? Abraham (18th century BCE), tenth-generation descendant of Noah, of Hebrew lineage, was the son of Terah, uncle of Lot, father of Isaac, grandfather of Jacob, and forefather of the Israelites. Jewish tradition states that he was the first to actively spread belief in One God Q: Who is Noah ?
